1400810.name: Fantasy Grounds - Flash Gordon Combat Map 1: Arboria + Fast Pursuit Rocket
1400810.description:
Flash Gordon Combat Map 1: Arboria + Fast Pursuit Rocket

Without a doubt, the Fast Pursuit Rocket is the swiftest skyship in Ming's Imperial fleet.
A double-sided, 24" x 30" combat map of a Fast Pursuit Rocket on one side and Arboria (with tree outpost) on the other, this map is designed for use with our Flash Gordon miniatures! Maps are wet, dry, and permanent marker erasable.
Bring the verdant elevations of the Great Tree Highway and swampy sod of Arboria to your tabletop!
Featuring multiple levels of wooden platforms, swinging bridges, ropes to swing from--not to mention a rather threatening-looking stump of many holes--and a wicker cage for trespassers, this map inspires plenty of action for characters in
The Savage World of Flash Gordon(TM) .
This full color map has a layer with a 1" grid and is intended for
The Savage World of Flash Gordon(TM) RPG, which requires the
Savage Worlds core rules to play.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
